msml:element.name: displacedPointsConstraint
msml:element.description: Sets the displacement for specified point coordinates. The displacement vector can either be the same for all points (i.e. one triple) or one displacement vector has to be specified for each point.

meta.value: Set coordinates of displaced points separated by spaces.
Set the displacement vector of the points. Either provide one displacement for all points (DIM = 3) or a displacement triple for each point (DIM = 3*DIM(indices)).
